thread.title: Why No. 16 Penn Can Knock Off No. 1 Kansas

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Why No. 16 Penn Can Knock Off No. 1 Kansas
text:
The first rule of filling out your NCAA bracket is to confidently place every No. 1 seed into the second round. It’s the only blissful moment of filling out your bracket. Because it’s the only thing you know you’re going to get right. A No. 1 seed has never lost in the round of 64.
We’re not here to tell you do something stupid. But you should definitely think about doing something stupid: Picking No. 16 Pennsylvania to topple No. 1 Kansas.
